83036.summary: Some customers in the Vedder Crossing area of Chilliwack are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83036.title: Sept 14 - Chilliwack (Vedder Crossing) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
